special_abilities.name: Chameleon Carapace.
descriptions: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap.
descriptions: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The thri-kreen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Variant: Weapons Multiattack.
descriptions: The thri-kreen makes two gythka attacks or two chatkcha attacks.

actions.name: Variant: Gythka.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Variant: Chatkcha.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
